description: Demolition of existing small rear ground floor extension, excavation and erection of new ground floor and lower ground floor, half-width rear extension with green roof, creation of lower ground floor garden terrace, erection of rear dormer window, installation of two front and one rear rooflights, installation of a solar thermal panel on rear roofslope, replacement of all rear windows and lower ground floor front window with traditional timber sash windows, together with internal alterations comprising demolition of a dividing wall at both lower ground floor and ground floor levels and general refurbishment of the property. (Full Planning  application also made ref P081966)
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: Notwithstanding the approved drawings, a further drawing at scale 1:20 showing the detailed design of the rear dormer window, including the provision of a sill to the bottom of the window, and its joining to the roofslope shall be submited to and approved by the  Local Planning Authority prior to the commencement of any works. The dormer shall be constructed in full accordance with these approved details.

REASON: In order to ensure the preservation and enhancement of the character of the Grade II listed building.
